updateDescription:
We're improving the app with new features, improvements, and bug fixes with each release.

See what's new:
• Crash fix while opening comments, editing messages
• Refactored codebase
• New Material 3 icons
• Dynamic app icon
• Color fixes
• Dark mode implementation (partial)
• Reverted to Material 2 switches
• Updated dependencies
• Fixed clutter when opening new activities
• New loading animation
• Offline caching (beta, needs optimization)
• Bug fixes & UI/UX improvements
